Mapcolonies : Raster Catalog Information (v1.0)

Created by Alex Lebinson, last modified on Feb 24, 2022

  1. typename = 'mc:MCRasterRecord'

  2. main_namespace = 'http://schema.mapcolonies.com/raster'

  3. The Raster sub-system Catalog profile fields with information of each of them.

PYCSW Quarriable/XML Element Name

Type

Description

mc:productId

text

unique external product id

mc:productName

text

the product name

mc:productVersion

text

the product version

mc:productType

enum 

Valid Values:

OrthophotoBest / Orthophoto / OrthophotoHistory / RasterMapBest / RasterMap / RasterAidBest / RasterAid / RasterVector / RasterVectorBest

mc:productSubType

text

Based on values from product_sub_type tab

mc:description

text

The blocking rectangle of the product

mc:creationDateUTC

date

date of the creation row in catalog.

supported format: dd/mm/yyyy

mc:updateDateUTC

date

last date the record got and update in catalog.

supported format: dd/mm/yyyy

mc:imagingTimeBeginUTC

date

old photo date

supported format:

dd/mm/yyyy (not later than "End date")

mc:imagingTimeEndUTC

date

newest photo date

supported format:

dd/mm/yyyy (not earlier than "Start date")

mc:maxResolutionDeg

double

record resolution

double unsigned valid: 0.00000009 to 0.072

mc:maxResolutionMeter

double

double unsigned (not less than min res.) valid: 0.01 to 8000

mc:minHorizontalAccuracyCE90

double

EP90 / CE90 Maximum absolute plane accuracy range in meters

mc:sensors

text

List of sensors used as a source for the product

mc:layerPolygonParts

geojson

Polygons of the discrete parts (versions) and the list of layers in the best converted to Geojson

mc:footprint

geojson

Geographical delineation of the product / model trace

mc:SRS

int

Reference System ID (EPSG), ex: 4326 / 3857

mc:SRSName

text

Name of reference system

mc:region

text

Sector / countries

mc:classification

enum 

Product classification / confidentiality

Valid Values: Classification

mc:producerName

text

Manufacturer / organization that produced / supplied the product

mc:RMS

double

Tollerance, standard deviation in %

mc:scale

integer

valid: 0 to 100000000

mc:productBBox

text

The blocking rectangle of the product

minX,minY,maxX,maxY

mc:ingestionDate

date

Catalog internal. Default: Now.

mc:links

text(comma separated)

Consume URLS for the product

mc:type

enum 

Type of the product

Valid Values:

RECORD_RASTER / RECORD_3D / RECORD_DEM

mc:insertDate

date

Catalog internal

mc:boundingBox

wkt

pycsw internal, currently stored footprint in wkt format

mc:keywords

string

free key words text

mc:includedInBests

text(comma separated)

Raster internal, list of best where discrete used

mc:discretes

text(JSON)

List of discretes with their order included in BEST

Go to query examples
